summary: FRONT SUSPENSION MAKES A CRUNCHING NOISE WHEN EXPANDED OR CONTRACTED.  DEALER STATED THAT THEY "THINK"  IT MIGHT BE THE STRUT MOUNTS.  VERY COSTLY ESTIMATE TO TRY SOMETHING THAT MIGHT WORK.  I'VE SEEN OTHER COMPLAINTS REGARDING THIS AND WANTED TO REGISTER MINE ALONG WITH THE OTHERS.   *NLM
